Description:
Detects potential DLL sideloading of "dbghelp.dll"

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential DLL Sideloading Of DBGHELP.DLL
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (image_loaded like '%\dbghelp.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\softwaredistribution\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\system32\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\systemtemp\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\syswow64\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\winsxs\%') and  not ((image_loaded like '%\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\vtrace\platforms\windll\amd64\dbghelp.dll' or image_loaded like '%\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\vtrace\platforms\windll\i386\dbghelp.dll') or (image_loaded like '%\epic games\launcher\engine\binaries\thirdparty\dbghelp\dbghelp.dll' or image_loaded like '%\epic games\magiclegends\x86\dbghelp.dll')))
